name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Best Homepage Ever: Custom New Tab Launcher

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically sets Best Homepage Ever as your homepage and default new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Automatically sets Best Homepage Ever as your homepage
- Sets BestHomepageEver to open in new tabs, or allows you to open any custom URL as your new tab page.
